K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:422b-1: sarba ta th'a ga ta gu hya mah'a gupta ko sha aaksha ya ni dhi d'i pa mah'a pra ta s'a dha natandra dzny'a n'a shcarya dhu ti tsakra n'a ma mah'a ya na s'u tra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:422b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:422b-4: gsang ba'i mdzod chen po mi zad pa gter gyi sgron ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:422b-5: brtul zhugs chen po bsgrub pa'i rgyud /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:422b-6: ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:422b-7: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:422b-8: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:422b-9: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dpal kun tu bzang po chen po ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba phyogs bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423a-1: bsdus pa'i bde bar gshegs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje mi phyed pa'i bdag nyid chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423a-2: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423a-3: lhun gyis grub pa'i longs spyod chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423a-4: chos ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423a-5: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul chen po'i bdag nyid de 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423a-6: dbus brjod du med pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423a-7: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba yum gyi mkha' rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas khang na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423a-9: du ma dang bral ba'i phyir rgya phyogs bcur yongs su mchad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423a-10: chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423a-11: spros pa med pa'i tshul gyis pho brang gi snying po zlum por gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423a-14: 'bras bur ldan pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423a-15: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'i thabs las byung ba'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423a-17: ye shes kyi tshogs thugs rje rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423a-18: rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo bzhin rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi lam stegs su shar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423a-20: nang med par lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang de na nyi ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-1: phyed kyis 'od gsal bar snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-2: che ba'i yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dril bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-3: mu tig gi chun mdzes 'phyad ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-7: rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i rgyan gyi khyad par dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ta la'i ljon shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-8: re ba skong ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-9: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-11: lha'i bu mo rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rol mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-12: glu dbyangs kyi chigs su bcad pas brgyan pa'i gnas khyad par rgyu rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i gnas de nyid na thabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-13: shes rab rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i nyi zla dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-14: ma chags ma gos pa'i padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-15: mi zad pa'i rin po che 'bar ba'i gdan khri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-17: snam rten du ldan par gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-19: khrag 'thung gi tshogs 'dus pa'i gnas su'ang 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-20: du ra khrod kyi rgyan gyi khyad par gyi bye brag zhing gi gdan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-22: thod pa rnam gsum gyi mtshan ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-23: rlung nag gi phung po spungs shing rakta'i rgya mtsho mi zad par 'khrug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-24: me ri ser nag tu 'khyil cing 'bar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-25: keng rus kyi ri rab las rakta'i khrag zhag gi chu 'bab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:423b-26: 'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang po 'khrug pa'i gnas na dregs pa khyo shug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:424a-0: @424a *// sems can chen po'i gdan dang bcas pa'i gnas kun tu bzang po'i bsod nams dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427a-22: yang nyan thos kyi sa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427a-24: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427a-26: phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad la rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas smra bsam las 'das pa de bzhin nyid stong pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te cang mi mdzad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427a-29: mdzad pa rnam par yang mi 'gog mi mdzad pa'ang mi gnas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427a-34: gsung ba'ang mi 'gog gsung ba rnam par yang mi 'gog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427a-38: snod kyi khams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427a-39: sa'i khyad par thams cad la'ang mi gzigs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427b-1: gzigs shing dgongs pa la'ang mi 'gog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427b-3: mi 'gog pa la'ang mi gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427b-4: de nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427b-5: snod kyi khams de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427b-6: bcud kyi khams de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427b-7: sa'i khyad par de dag thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid tsam du dmigs su med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427b-9: nam mkha' ni chos thams cad kyi rjes su'ang song la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427b-10: ji lta bu'i ngo bor yang gdags su med pa de bzhin du don dam pa byang chub sems de'ang chos thams cad la'ang khyab la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427b-12: de ltar chos kyi sku'i ngo bor brjod du med pa la brnal bzhin du yum kun tu bzang mo rngam pa'i kro dhi'i rgyal mos stong nyid kyi ngang las glu 'dis bskul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427b-14: aom/ snang stong stong pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427b-15: smra bsam las 'das don dam byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427b-16: stong nyid ngang las mi 'da'i dam tshig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427b-17: snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo bstan du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427b-18: zhes bskul bas bskul bar thugs su chud nas stong nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngang las rig pa'i ye shes snying rje chen po yis kun du klong bdal bar khyab ste snying rje chen po des 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:427b-19: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab bar mdzad nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428a-0: yang snod kyi khams kun la khyab par mdzad nas yang bcud kyi khams kun la @428a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428a-2: bcud kyi khams kun la khyab par mdzad nas sa'i khyad par kun la khyab par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428a-4: nyi ma bar snang la shar ba'i 'od kun la snyoms pa bzhin du rig pa'i nyi ma snying rjes byang chub kyi sems kyis kyang stong nyid kyi ngang kun la snyoms par khyab gdal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428a-5: de'i tshe gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de nyid yang ting nge 'dzin las langs nas snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428a-6: zhugs ma thag tu snying rjes kun la khyab par gyur pa ni ting nge 'dzin de'i mthu yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428a-7: de nas yum kun tu bzang mo rngam pa kro dhi'i rgyal mos yang glu 'dis bskul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428a-8: ma ltar byams pa'i thugs rjes kun tu khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428a-9: mkha' ltar go 'byed cho 'phrul 'byung gnas las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428a-10: longs spyod rdzogs dang thugs rje sprul pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428a-11: 'bar ba'i sku mchog bdag la bstan du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428a-12: aa la la ho zhes gsol ba btab pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad don dam pa byang chub sems la shar bar mkhyen nas mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas rdo rje'i mngon du phyung ste; dper na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428a-13: zla ba dri ma med pa nam mkha' dang ba la shar ba bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428a-14: rdo rje'i sku de las rig pa'i cho 'phrul gyi 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428b-0: nyi 'od kyi 'od @428b zer dus gcig shar ba lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'dod chags chen po'i tshul rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te zhugs nas kyang yum kro dhi'i rgyal mo la gzigs te 'dzum pa rnam par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428b-2: de nas yum kro dhi'i rgyal mos kyang spyan zim bag gi tshul gyis gzigs nas lan stong du brkyang phyag btsal te g-yon pa slong ba'i glu 'dis rnam par bskul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428b-4: yid bzhin sku mchog tshogs chen mngon rdzogs lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428b-5: rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis gar mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428b-6: dga' mchog rdo rje'i byang chub sems chen de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428b-7: 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i padma'i gnas su phob ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428b-9: dkar la 'tsher ba'i byang chub sems sprin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428b-10: chags pa dmar po dbang gi rang bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428b-11: gnyis med 'phros pa'i byin brlabs bsam yam [?] las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428b-12: ye shes lha tshogs sprul sku bsam yas 'thon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428b-13: ma rig mun pas ldongs pas don gyis phye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428b-14: dgon dung gnas nas byang chub myu gu skyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428b-15: zhi ba 'gog pa'i sa las rnam par slong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:428b-16: zhes rnam par bskul bas gnyis su med pa'i rnam par rol pas rol zhing brjid pa dang bcas nas gar mdzad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429a-1: mdzes pa'i smin ring bskyod cing sgyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429a-2: dung gi phur bas g-yon pa slong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429a-5: rnam par 'dor pa'i rol pa'i gar gyis nam mkha'i khams kun tu khyab par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429a-6: rnam par rol pa nges 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429a-7: 'byung ba las gyur pa thams cad la khyab par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429a-9: sems las byung ba kun la khyab par mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi sems zhi zhing 'khyil pas rol pa'i char mngon par phab pas snod kyi khams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429a-13: sa'i khyad par thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429a-14: byang chub kyi rol pa sna tshogs sgeg pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429a-26: 'jog pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i rdo rje 'dzin gyis kun tu rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429a-27: de nas de'i tshe thugs rnam par dag pa'i mkha' klong nas rig pa byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer brjod kyis mi lang ba 'byam klas pa shar ba de las gsung gi yig 'bru 'khor lo'i tshogs su'ang snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429b-0: yig 'bru de nyid thugs phyag @429b mchan du'ang gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429b-1: thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'od du 'phros shing rnam par 'du ba'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi 'khor rgyal ba yab yum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429b-6: 'joms ma rnams kyis skur yang rang rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya las snang bar byas te gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la mdun gyis bltas nas rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429b-7: de ltar re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor zhabs 'bring dang bcas pa 'byam klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa lhun gyis grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429b-8: yang 'od zer de dag re re las he ru ka mang po'i tshogs kyang shar to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429b-9: he ru ka re re la'ang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gi 'khor so so'i zhabs 'bring dang bcas pa lhun gyis grub par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429b-10: he ru ka re re las rig pa'i nyi ma'i char mngon par phab ste mun nag gi glog gsal bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429b-15: chos kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rngam pa'i cho 'phrul yan man snrel zhi thams cad du ling long phyad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:429b-16: de'i tshe he ru ka 'od kyi phreng ba des ru tra can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-0: dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa rang rang gi che ba'i nga rgyal rab tu ston pa rnams zhi zhing dul bar gyur to rang rang gi dbang phrogs nas sangs @430a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-1: rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la dad par gyur nas 'dus rab tu 'dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-2: de'i tshe na byang chub kyi 'od zer kun tu khyab pa des 'du shes med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-3: 'gog pa la gnas pa'i mur lhung ba rnams sa bon mes tshig pa dang 'dra ba de'ang dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems rin po che'i chu des dbang bskur bas byang chub sems thob ste 'gro pa'i don byed par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-5: sa'i khyad par la gnas pa rnams kyang rang rang gi sa la skyo sems skyes te las kyi tshe bkag nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la rab tu dad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-6: des na 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur te 'dus nas shin tu skrag te gsol ba btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-7: ae ma'o ae ma ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-8: gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-10: byang chub char sprin ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-11: sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-12: sprul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-13: khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-14: byin brlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-15: dgon gdungs spangs pa ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-16: 'gog pa gsos pa ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-18: dam tshig can du byin brlabs mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-19: bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430a-20: rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430b-0: ces gsol ba btab pas @430b bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des sku gsung thugs gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas 'khor rnam par sbyor ba'i rdo rje'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430b-1: byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po la gzigs nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430b-2: de nas byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po des bskul bar rnam par rig nas btsun mo bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo dang gnyis su med par sbyor zhing rang gi stan las rnam par langs te byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma gnas lngar btab nas lce padmo'i steng du las kyi rdo rje bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430b-3: brkyang phyag btsal nas mi 'jigs pa'i lta bas ston pa'i zhal du bltas nas don bsdu bar gsol ba btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430b-4: gsang ba'i bdag po yab yum dgongs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430b-5: 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs mang po dgongs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430b-6: gsang mdzad ye shes klog gi 'khor lo 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430b-7: chos kyi rgyal po chen pos bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:430b-8: zhes gsol ba btab pas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos byed pa po kun tu bzang po rdo rje las kyi bka' bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir thugs gsang ba'i mkha' las byang chub sems sprin spros pas las kyi 'khor lo rdo rje rgya gram gcig lag tu bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431a-0: las kyi dbang bskur nas ming yang las kyi sems dpa' byed pa po kun tu bzang por btags te las kyi dbang thob @431a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431a-2: chos kyi 'khor lo padma 'dab ma brgyad pa lce steng du bzhag ste smra ba'i seng ge chos kyi sems dpa' zhes ming du dbang bskur he chos smra ba'i dbang thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431a-3: de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po de btsun mo kun tu bzang mo la 'jug cing spobs pa can du gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431a-4: de nas smra ba'i seng ge kun tu bzang po des 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams snod du rung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir las kyi 'khor lo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431a-5: chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du bskor te cho 'phrul 'di dag rnam par bstan te zhing khams mtha' dag kyang g-yos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431a-14: snral zhi'i zhing khams mtha' dag kyang ling long phyad par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431a-15: de nas byang chub sems kyi mtshan mas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyi gnas ldar rig par byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431a-21: gong 'og rim pa ji bzhin du; ;rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du gnos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431a-22: bskal bzang dam tshig chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431b-0: zhes bsgo bas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs @431b rnams rang rang gi sems rangs par byas te dam tshig thob nas rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod rnam par 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431b-1: de nas byed pa po kun tu bzang po las kyi bka' ba des bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la gtsug gi 'dud phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas te phyi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431b-3: gsang ba mchod pa de kho na nyid kyis mchod de gsol ba btab po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431b-4: 'di ltar rmad byung ngo mtshar khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431b-5: sangs rgyas yab gyur rgyal ba'i sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431b-6: ya mtshan chen po ston par spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431b-7: bka' yi 'khor lo dam pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431b-8: smra brjod yul las rab 'das kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431b-9: dag gi lam nas rab brjod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431b-10: dpes mtshon tshig gi lde mig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431b-11: gsal bar mtshon te go bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431b-12: aa la la ho zhes gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431b-13: de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so; ;de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po kun tu bzang po de la lugs su btud de brkyang phyag btsal nas rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas gsol ba btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431b-14: smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:431b-15: khyod la bdag cag zhu bar sbobs na gsang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-1: tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-4: ci 'dod pa bdag la zhus shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-5: bdag gis gnang ba'i skabs dbye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-7: smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-9: khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yab byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rje btsan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-10: rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi lha phud /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-11: chos thams cad kyi mdzod lags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-12: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bdag cag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-13: gsang ba'i tshig lam gyis ston par mi snang ba'i rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-14: rkyen bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-16: legs par bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-17: smra ba'i seng+ges bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-18: aom a'a:h'um aa la la ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-19: rgyal ba'i sras po cang mi gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-20: mi gsung ba nyid rgya cher bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-21: bshad du med pa'i don de ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-22: rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bshad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-23: de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-24: rnam par brjod par mi mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432a-25: bka' mi stsal par dgongs pa 'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432b-0: de bas na gsang ba don dam pa'i byang chub kyi snying po de smra bsam las 'das shing brjod du med pas de la tshig tu smra ba legs @432b pa ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432b-1: tshig tu smos pa'i dus nyid gol ba yin par phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang bshad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432b-2: da ltar ston pa nyid kyang don de nyid dgongs nas ma gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432b-4: de bas na ma skyes pa'i snying po byang chub sems tshig tu spros pa dang bral gyis kyang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i dbang du mtshan ma'i tshig gi rnal 'byor pa rnams tshig gi phyir 'brang ba'i phyir don rtogs pa'i bkri ba'i phyir rgyal ba rnams kyi tshig gi sgo nas gsungs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432b-5: 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432b-7: de ltar na bdag cag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432b-8: ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa tshig gi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi don du rdo rje tshig gi lam du brjod pas don gsal bar byed pa de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432b-9: smra ba'i seng+ge las kyi bka' pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432b-10: khyod nyid kyis zhu bar spobs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432b-12: dbang bas na bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la zhus shig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:432b-13: de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis rnam par rtog pa mkhyen nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la lan stong du bskor pa byas te rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa rgyas pa de kho na nyid kyis mchod nas 'di skad gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-2: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-3: byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-4: tshig tu brjod pa ma legs na'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-6: don la rtsing la tshig la zhib //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-7: tshig gis bsams pa rangs bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-8: snying po byang chub don 'di la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-9: dpes mtshon tshig gi lde mig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-10: gsang ba de nyid bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-11: zhes gsol ba btab pa las bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po smra ba'i seng+ges gsol ba btab pa'ang mkhyen /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-12: 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis sems kyi rtog pa'ang mkhyen nas tshig gi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal 'byor yang thugs su chud nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum phyung ste ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa yang nas yang du gsor zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sgra chen po rab tu bsgrags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-14: bo dhi tsitta gu hya sa ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-15: 'di ni gsung ma thag tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-16: sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-17: rab tu sngangs te brgyal bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-18: 'khor tshogs gzhan ma smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-19: de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-20: rigs kyi bu rnams nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433a-21: gang tshig gis brjod du rung ba thams cad ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-0: ji srid @433b brjod du rung ba ma yin pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-2: yi ge las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-4: yi ges brjod du rung ba thams cad ni gzugs kyi sku'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-6: spyod pa'ang de nyid yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-7: gang don dam pa'i bden pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-8: chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni sngags kyi lta ba yin par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-9: de nyid rgyu'i tshul du gnas pa las 'bras bu'i chul du kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-10: gzugs kyi skur snang ste ji ltar spyad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-11: spyad du rung ba thams cad ni spyod par rnal 'byor can gyis blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-12: de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-13: aa la la ho zhes pa'i sgra brjod de bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-16: sngags kyi lta ba la blo gnas pa gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-18: spyod pa la blo gnas pa ni gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-19: spyod pa 'ba' zhig la blo gnas pa ni gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-20: gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-22: de'i don khyod nga la zhu ba ni legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:433b-24: gsang sngags ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gi dgongs pa'i yul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434a-1: kyi don dam pa'i bden pa tsam kyang spangs na kun rdzob kyi bden pa lta ga la yod de bden pa gnyis su'ang dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434a-3: spyod pa la blo gnas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434a-5: sa la bsnyen pa rnams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434a-7: rnal 'byor blo mnyam pa nyid du blo chung ba rnams la ni bden pa rnams pa gnyis kyi tshul yod de don dam par ma skyes pa'i tshul du blo chud pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434a-8: kun rdzob tu mtshan ma thabs kyi phyag rgya sgyu ma'i tshul du'ang med pa ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434a-9: mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434a-10: mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434a-11: slob pa'i rnal 'byor de ni bden pa rnam pa gnyis la brten nas lhun gyis grub pa'i sa goms pa che chung gis 'grub ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434a-12: sgra'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal 'byor don las ring du gyur pa rnams ni spyod pa 'ba' zhig la blo gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434a-14: log pa'i kun rdzob 'ba' zhig la rtog gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434a-15: yang dag pa'i kun rdzob lha'i dkyil 'khor yang mthong ba med pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434a-17: de bas na log pa'i kun rdzob so so'i skye bo lta bu'i chos la brten nas yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434a-18: lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du chos thams cad shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-0: @434b yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud par nus pa ni rig pa'i skyes bu zhes grags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-1: smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa bo rdo rje kun tu bzang pos gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-3: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i rang bzhin gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-4: dper brjod na ji skad du brjod pa lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-5: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-7: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul rnams ngas bshad kyis nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-10: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-11: rab tu brjod par dka' na mdor bsdu na rnam pa bcur 'dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-13: gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-14: gsang sngags kyi ming gi khyad par dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-15: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-16: gsang sngags kyi dngos grub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-17: gsang sngags kyi grub pa'i gnas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-18: gsang sngags kyi bzlas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-19: gsang sngags kyi phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-20: gsang sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-21: gsang sngags kyi lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:434b-24: de dag gi dper brjod pa'ang rnam pa bcu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435a-3: mgal me bskor ba lta bu'i rnam par snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435a-6: sgyu ma zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni skyes bu'i rtsol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435a-8: sbyor sngags kyi sbyor ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435a-9: dbang po'i yid 'phrog pa'i rnam pa cir yang snang yang slu pa'i bdag nyid can de snang ba med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435a-10: de bzhin du gsang sngags sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435a-12: rdzas kyi sbyor pa las grub pa'i rtags dag snang yang de la rang bzhin med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435a-13: smig rgyu zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang 'gro ba skom gyis gdungs pa'i dus su nyi ma dro ba las smig rgyu la chur mthong yang de la chu'i rang bzhin med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435a-14: de bzhin du gsang sngags ming gi khyad par yang gdags pa'i gzhi med pa la ming dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435a-15: tha snyad btags pa'ang ming nyid dmigs su ga la yod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435a-16: rmi lam zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni skyes bu gnyid log pa'i tshe bde sdug gi rnam pa mang po rmis kyang sangs nas ci yang dmigs su med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435a-17: de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'ang ji ltar spyad na'ang spyad pa'i dmigs pa kun dang bral lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435a-18: gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang chu 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435b-1: 'bru mar la brten nas bzhin gyi gzugs su snang yang bzhin de nyid du 'phos pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435b-2: de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi dngos grub kyang bsgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435b-4: yo byad la brten nas 'byung yang dmigs pa dang bral lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435b-5: dri za'i grong khyer zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni bar snang na dri za gang na gnas pa der grong khyer yang de na gnas te de byung ma thag tu rtag pa ma yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435b-6: gsang sngags kyi gnas kyang rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyis kyang bskyed par 'byung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435b-7: de yang ther zug ma yin no; ;brag ca zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni brag ca ngos la sgra ji skad skyen pa skang brag ca la'ang de bzhin du 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435b-8: 'byung yang sgrar mi dmigs pa de bzhin du gsang sngags bzlas pa'i sgra'ang bzlas pa tsam nyid na stong pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435b-9: chu zla zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni zla ba'i gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du snang yang chu la zla ba med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435b-10: de bzhin du phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la'ang gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:435b-11: chu'i chu bur zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni chu'i rlabs chen gcig las chu bur mang du 'byung zhing slar yang 'du ba de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa'ang gcig tu ma chad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436a-0: mig 'khrul pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni mi mig nad can gyis bar snang la bltas @436a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436a-1: na zla ba gnyis su snang yang zla ba la gnyis su gyur pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436a-2: de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi lta ba'ang 'dzin rtog gi lta ba cir rnam par rtog pa rnam mang yongs su grub par yongs su mi blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436a-3: mgal me bskor ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni gang dag lag na mgal me thogs nas bskor na dbyibs kyi rnam pa ji ltar yang snang ste; de la dbyibs med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436a-4: de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i sems kyi cho 'phrul cir yang snang zhing 'byung la dngos por ma grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436a-6: de ltar na gsang sngags kyi spyod pa ni de ltar shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436a-8: de ltar bas na rnal 'byor pas yang dag par kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436a-9: 'phags pa rgyud gyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436a-10: ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par phye ba'i sgo nas gleng bslang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436a-11: sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-0: de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi rgyal po la lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa rgyas pa de kho na nyid kyis rab tu mchod de kun tu rab tu mchod nas gtsug gi 'dud pas phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas te @436b 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-1: ae ma'o bde bar gshegs pa kun tu bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-2: ae ma'o ye nas dag pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-3: ae ma'o gsang ba mchog gi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-4: ae ma'o ye shes rngam pa'i glog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-5: ae ma'o gnyis med dgyes chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-6: ae ma'o bde ba bde chen mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-7: ae ma'o rnam dag dpal khyod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-8: ae ma'o bdag cag gsol ba 'debs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-9: byang chub sems 'di ji ltar skyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-10: dkyil 'khor rnams ni ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-11: phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan nyid ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-12: bsnyen sgrub rnam bzhi ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-13: dngos grub sgrub pa'i rnam grangs ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-14: sngags kyi sdom pa ji ltar bsrung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-15: rnal 'byor brtul zhugs ji ltar spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-16: dregs pa'i tshogs ni ji ltar gdul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-17: rnam bzhi'i las ni ji ltar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-18: brang pa'i nan tur ji ltar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-19: rnal 'byor rnams la brtse ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-20: bdag cag rnams la sman slad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-21: bcom ldan snying pos bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-22: aa la la ho zhes gsol pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-23: bcom ldan 'das gsang pa mchog gi bdag pos gsol ba btab pa thugs su chud nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-25: gsang sngags mdo'i don rnams phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor ba la lan gdags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:436b-26: dad pa can gyi 'gro ba rnams yid ches par bya ba'i phyir nga la zhu ba legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437a-1: bzhi'i sangs rgyas sngar 'das pa rnams kyis gsungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437a-2: da ltar bzhugs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437a-3: slad kyis byon pa rnams kyis gsung bar 'gyur ba rnams kyi don thog mar dge ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437a-9: rtags kyi rol pa; ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor los rnam par bsgyings pa gzhung chen po 'di ngas bshad par bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437a-10: skal ba dang ldan pa rnams gsang sngags kyi don zab mo ni thos par dka' na thos nas de'i don la gnas par dka' ste phal gyi thun mong du ma gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437a-11: 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal bo ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437a-12: sngags kyi mdo bstan pa'i le'us te gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de snying po byang chub la nges par 'grel pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437a-14: zhugs nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs la bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437a-16: chos thams cad ni byang chub sems su 'dus shing byang chub kyi sems snang bar gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437a-18: chos thams cad ni lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-3: sems nyid chos thams cad kyi rnam par snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-4: 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-7: sems bdag cag rnams kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-8: gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-12: sems kyi mtshan nyid ni sems kyang lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-13: ngag gi rnam pa lta bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-15: sems kyi rnam pa lta bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-16: lus kyang tshig tu brjod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-17: sems kyi rnam pa lta bur rang gi lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-20: 'on kyang byang chub du sems bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-21: de nas yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-22: ae ma'o dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-23: phung po khams dang skye mched dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-24: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-25: chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-26: rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-27: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:437b-29: de nas yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438a-0: ae ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan @438a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438a-1: gyi; ;sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung ba'i thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438a-2: chos kun skye ba med pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438a-3: skye ba 'di ni rab grags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438a-4: skye dang mi skye gnyis med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438a-7: de nas yang me long lta bu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438a-8: ae ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438a-9: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438a-10: chos kun 'gag pa med pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438a-15: de nas yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438a-16: ae ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438a-17: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438a-18: chos kun gnas pa med pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438a-19: gnas pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438a-20: gnas dang mi gnas med pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438a-23: de nas yang chos thams cad so so kun du rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-0: ae ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan @438b gyi; ;sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-1: chos kun dmigs pa med pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-2: dmigs pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-3: dmigs dang mi dmigs med pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-6: de nas yang chos thams cad bya ba la nan tan du grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-7: ae ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-9: chos kun spro bsdu med pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-10: spros dang bsdus par rab tu grags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-11: spros bsdus yod dang med pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-14: de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos aa la la ho zhes sgra phyung ste byang chub sems la bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-15: ae ma'o bde chen kun tu bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-16: ae ma'o stong nyid byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-17: ae ma'o dag pa dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-18: ae ma'o mi sgrib gsal ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-19: ae ma'o mnyam nyid dbyer med chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-20: ae ma'o so sor rang rig sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-21: ae ma'o byang chub lhun gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-22: byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:438b-23: zhes bstod de bcom ldan 'das nyid khyad par du gyur pa'ang byang chub sems nyid yin zhing byang chub kyi sems thugs su chud pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439a-0: bdag cag rig 'dzin gyi tshogs su gyur pa rnams kyang @439a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439a-1: byang chub sems la smon par 'tshal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439a-5: bdag cag kyang rang rang gi sems g-yos par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439a-8: nyams su myong bar bgyi bar 'tshal na bdag cag de 'dra ba'i bsam pa can la snying rje chen por dgongs par mdzad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439a-10: dgongs par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gsol ba btab par thags su chud nas snying rje byang chub 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gnyis su med par mngon par 'du mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439a-11: gnyis su med par mngon par 'du mdzad [?] pas byang chub sems kyi sprin gyis thams cad rgyas par khyab pa ni til 'bru mar gyis khyab pa bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439a-13: ae ma'o ye shes rnam dag chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439a-14: sna tshogs snang yang rtog par gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439a-15: ngo bo nyid ni brjod du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439a-16: snod ma yin la bstan par dka'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439a-17: ae ma'o srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439a-18: bdag tu rtog pa srid rtsa'i nyes dmigs kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439a-19: yun rings dus nas 'khyams pa'i 'gro ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439a-20: mi mthun bde sdug gnas rnams so sor gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439a-21: log rtog nor ba'i dbang gis kun brtags kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-0: rang @439b bzhin nyid las mnyam pa rdul tsam med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-1: ae ma'o yun rings dus nas rmongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-2: ye nas don gyi sangs rgyas yin mod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-3: rmongs pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-4: log rtog nyid la dngos med byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-5: 'khrul 'khor nyid kyang mi zad rgyan du che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-6: snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas su gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-7: phung po lnga nyid mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-8: srid rtsa'i nyes dmigs nyid kyang byang chub snying por gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-9: phyi nang snod bcud yab yum ngang du gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-10: zhes gsungs pas chos thams cad byang chub sems su gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-11: 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-12: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o;;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-13: /de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag nyid sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-14: gsung thugs rdo rje las dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byung bar bzhed nas btsun mo dang gnyis su med par 'du mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-15: mngon par 'du mdzad nas yang dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byung ba rdo rje'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mdo 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:439b-17: gsang sngags byin brlabs bsam yas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-2: mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-3: rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-5: bkri drang rdul tshon dkyil 'khor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-6: gsum po dag tu rgyal bas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-8: de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po kun tu bzang pos gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-9: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis chos thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gsum du brjod par mthong lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-10: de'ang 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-11: ae ma'o gsang mchog bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-12: ye nas lhun grub dag pa'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-14: rdo rje rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-15: chos kun ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-16: rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-17: rang bzhin lhun grub zab mo'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-18: bcom ldan snying pos bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des gsol ba btab pa'i don thugs su chud nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba rdo rje rgyas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-21: zhugs nas yang rang bzhin don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor spros pa dang bral ba 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440a-22: ae ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-0: bla na med pa rtogs @440b 'gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-1: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-2: de ni dkyil 'khor snying po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-4: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des rang bzhin don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam grangs 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-5: de la 'di ni spyir bsdus pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-6: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-7: rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-8: phung po lnga don sangs rgyas lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-9: 'byung ba lnga don dbyings phyug yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-10: khams dang skye mched mang po kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-11: sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-12: des na srid gsum dkyil 'khor che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-14: de la phung po lnga sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa yang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-15: srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-16: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gzugs rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-17: chos kyi dbyings las byung bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-18: dbyer med don gyi gti mug pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-19: rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-20: srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-21: bde sdug tshor ba'i phung po kun //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:440b-28: ma 'dres dbyings la snang bas na //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:444b-22: gser gyi dril bu 'bar ba dag /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:444b-25: ta la'i skye shing tsong tsong 'khril //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:444b-27: ta la'i skyed shing de dag la //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:444b-29: bya rnams snyan pa skad kyang 'byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:444b-30: sgo drung de dag re re na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:444b-31: khrus kyi rdzing bu dbyibs legs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:444b-32: blo mchog yan lag ldan pa'i chu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-1: med de dag re re na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-2: lha dang lha mo bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-3: phyi rol kho ra khor yug na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-5: de la sogs pa bsam yas mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-7: lha mchog rnams kyi bsod nams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-8: rgyu las grub par rgyal bas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-9: pho brang de na gnas pa yi //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-15: dpa' bo de yi spyan snga na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-16: rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya chen yang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-18: rang rtags lag na rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-19: g-yas su rin chen 'byung ldan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-21: rang rtags rin chen zur brgyad 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-22: rgyab sna snang ba mtha' yas gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-25: g-yon du don yod grub pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-26: aindra n'i la ljang gu'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-27: rang rtags phyag na ral gri 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-28: kun kyang zhi ba'i cha lugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-29: thor tshugs rigs lnga dbu la brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-30: rdzogs pa'i skyil krung tshul du bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-097-003:445a-31: do shal dpung rgyan se mo do //
